QuestData.Title: WANTED: Kuu'rat's Tusks
QuestData.Description: Posted by: Eremor$B$BA ferocious elekk of unprecedented size has been seen near Gloomshade Grove.$B$BKnown to some as the ivory death, she is abnormally aggressive and has already taken the lives of several unwary travelers.$B$BThe rangari have as yet been unable to corner this creature. Anyone capable of taking down this beast should exchange proof of her demise to Eremor for a hefty bounty.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Slay her and retrieve her tusks.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Kuu'rat and bring her tusks to Eremor at Embaari Village.
QuestData.CompletionText: Are you here for the bounty on Kuu'rat?
QuestData.RewardText: The ivory death is slain? Impressive, traveler.$B$BThanks to you, we are all safer with Kuu'rat gone. I will share news of this deed with the other villagers.
